article.headline: Arkansas State 56, Richmond 37
article.story: LOUISVILLE, Ky. (AP) -- Brandon Ballard scored a career-high 19 points and Arkansas State held Richmond to 33 percent shooting in a 56-37 victory at the Colonial Classic. Ballard knocked down five 3-pointers and the Indians (1-3) made a decisive first-half run stand up. Kevin Steenberge led Richmond (3-2) with nine points, but the Spiders turned the ball over 19 times and couldn't recover from a 14-point halftime deficit. Arkansas State trailed by six early, but Ballard hit back-to-back 3-pointers to tie the game and the Indians ended the half with a 15-4 run to go up 32-18 at the break. Richmond briefly cut the lead to 44-35 with just over seven minutes to go, but Ballard hit a lay-up with the shot clock winding down and the Spiders would get no closer. Arkansas State out-rebounded Richmond 30-23 and outscored the Spiders in the paint, 24-14. Richmond faces Prairie View on Sunday in the second round of the Colonial Classic while the Indians take on No. 7 Louisville.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
